comment._content: Here's her husband: www.shorpy.com/node/4629 She looks like she'd be full of spunk!

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Battling "Bat" Nelson was a Danish-born boxer, born Oscar Mathaeus Nielsen (1882-1954); www.geocities.com/Colosseum/Track/4980/boxint.htm This is his first wife, Fayrene (Fay) King, a Denver artist who was one of the first women to draw a published comic strip. lambiek.net/artists/k/king_fay.htm In 1913, Fay and another lightweight boxing champion's wife, Mildred Wolgast, released a statement that "Our husbands no more shall fight as long as we both shall live." Fay and Bat divorced in 1916.
